item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
Go under "accounts" and then do what, exactly?
All the settings I see are a bunch of checkboxes for "account synchronization." I see absolutely nothing pertaining to the password.
item.content:encoded:
Go under “accounts” and then do what, exactly?

All the settings I see are a bunch of checkboxes for “account synchronization.” I see absolutely nothing pertaining to the password.
